page.title: 10HEALTH CARE IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {HEALTH CARE IN WOODHALL SPA {Midwives Most confinements are at the Maternity Units at Lincoln or Boston.Mothers and babies are discharged early and the District Midwives take over for up to 14 days.Antenatal clinics are held each week at surgery.{ {Health Visitors They visit when the midwife finishes & gives advice up to school age.Baby & Toddler clinics are held twice monthly with a Health Visitor or Doctor. {Spa Waters The once famous Spa Bath with its beneficial waters for rheumatoid arthritis is now closed,also the local hospital has been bought by a consortium & is to be used for medical treatment in the future.There are several retirement homes for the elderly in the area.
